description: a(n) = Sum{T(i,j)}, 0<=j<=i, 0<=i<=2n, T given by A026552.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,6,-6)
formula: G.f.: (1+3*x+3*x^2)/((1-x)*(1-6*x^2)). Cf. A026565. - _Ralf Stephan_, Feb 03 2004a(n) = 6*a(n-2) + 7. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 24 2014a(2n) = A233325(n). - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 24 2014
